nullEngine.util

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • nullEngine.util.Clock

  • public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for time keeping

    • Field Summary

      static int TIME_RES
      The maximum resolution (per second) to record time

        The maximum resolution (per second) to record time

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        public long getTime()
        Get the current time
        Returns:
        The current time on the GLFW timer in units of TIME_RES
        See Also:
        TIME_RES, GLFW.glfwGetTime()

      • getTimeSeconds

        public double getTimeSeconds()
        Get the time in seconds
        Returns:
        The time returned by the GLFW timer
        See Also:
        GLFW.glfwGetTime()

      • update

        public boolean update()
        Update the timer with the new time
        Returns:
        true if the time since update was last called is greater than TIME_RES
        See Also:
        TIME_RES

      • resetTotalDelta

        public void resetTotalDelta()
        Reset the total delta value stored in the timer

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta()
        Get the delta time
        Returns:
        The delta time since update() last returned true
        See Also:
        update()

      • getTotalDelta

        public double getTotalDelta()
        Get the total delta
        Returns:
        The delta time since resetTotalDelta() was last called
        See Also:
        resetTotalDelta()

      • hasSecondPassed

        public boolean hasSecondPassed()
        Checks wether a second has passed
        Returns:
        true if it has been more than a second since hasSecondPassed() was last called

      • getFPS

        public int getFPS()
        Get the frame rate
        Returns:
        The frame rate (in terms of getTotalDelta())
        See Also:
        getTotalDelta()
